programme.desc: Renee refuses to marry Obediah until he can prove that he's not messing around with his ex; Jason says that Carolyn is his daughter, but his questionable behavior has caused her to have doubts.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: DNA Mystery: You're Not My Daughter; Unlock: Marriage on the Rocks
programme.desc: Shay's bond with her presumed father is shaken when he questions his paternity. Meanwhile, Ashlee discovers recordings of her husband Brandt cheating with multiple women.

programme.title: Karamo

programme.desc: Lisa fears that her daughter is in denial regarding her shopping addiction; Brooklyn and her friend Kevyn ended their familial relationship badly; Oladean says his wife left him once he revealed he was sick with cancer, but she says he is a fraud.

programme.desc: Keenia and her brother Kenneth are fed up with their father Keith, for walking in and out of their lives.

programme.desc: John and Shay share their struggles of having a blended family.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: Cousins at War Over $384
programme.desc: After a night of too much drinking, Ro Ro claims that $384 of her money went MIA.

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: My Son is Very Sick…How Could You Deny Your Baby?
programme.desc: John says Dabria wants to trap him with someone else’s baby due to his future success as a rapper.

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: I'll Prove my Deceased Son is Not Your Baby's Father!
programme.desc: When Fernando passed away at 22, he was survived by his mom Susie, but Regina says he left behind a son! Susie says Regina is a stalker, but Fernando’s aunt disagrees! Plus, more desperate mothers seek their children’s father!

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: Five DNA Tests ... Will I Find the Father Today?
programme.desc: She says they have two kids together but he says they only have one. Then, when Sherida told Ron Ron she was pregnant with his baby, he changed his number. Plus, she cheated and now this family rests on these DNA result.

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: Did My Husband Sleep With My Sisters!
programme.desc: Deborah is scared to death that Jose is cheating on her with over thirty other people! Could her worst fears come true? Then, Laurie could be in for the shock of her life when she finds out if John is cheating on her with her own sister.

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: Your Secret Sex Life Will Be Exposed Today!
programme.desc: Emmett says he's had sex with over a thousand people. Then Mike tells Brittany after her mothers death that he may not be her father.

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: If My Fiance Had Sex With My Sister ... The Wedding Is Off!
programme.desc: These cheaters don't know when to stop! They swear that they've been faithful but these women say they know for a fact that they've been two-timed. What will the devastating lie-detector results reveal? Will these relationships survive the truth?

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: Revenge of the Geeks! Today We're Sexy and Hot
programme.desc: These guests are here to show the world, and their former crushes, that they're no longer geeks and nerds. Now these newly sexy singles are here to make a love connection and show off their new glamorous looks. Plus, our friend Adrienne Bailon stops by to help a girl who was a victim of bullying in school.

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: Your Baby Is White - I Can't Be The Father!
programme.desc: Kianna found pics of naked women in Nick’s phone and condoms and cologne in his gym bag. Is he cheating?

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: The DNA Results Are In! Do My Twins Have 2 Different Fathers?
programme.desc: The Paternity drama explodes on today’s MAURY! Could one woman’s twins really have 2 different fathers? It’s a one in a million DNA shot, but one that we have seen before on our show. Plus more wild DNA results on today’s MAURY!

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: Wild, Outrageous Winter Updates!
programme.desc: What happened after our guests left our show? Steve came to the show to find out if his 3 kids were his after Katie admitted to cheating with 5 men. Jordan called us from the delivery room because he was sure he didn’t father Chelsea’s baby!

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: 6 Babies…6 DNA Tests…Which Man Is The Dad?
programme.desc: You'll see women desperate for the truth about the identity of their baby's fathers. You'll see men who are positive that there's no chance at all that they're the daddy.

programme.title: The People's Court
programme.sub-title: Breakup Demolition Derby
programme.desc: Jamal says he's suing jealous ex-girlfriend for trying to run him over after accusing him of cheating on her.

programme.title: The People's Court
programme.sub-title: Jettisoning a Customer
programme.desc: Wayne says he purchased two jet skis from the defendant, Charles, who assured him they were in good, safe and working order. Wayne claims this was a total lie and the things are junk. He suing the liar in the name of justice for $1,790.41. Charles claims he fixed up the jet skis and Wayne checked them before buying. A few weeks later, he came back complaining about the engines, wanting a full refund after ruining perfectly good jet skis by running them improperly. Charles is accused of jettisoning a customer.

programme.title: The People's Court
programme.sub-title: Devastated by a Dog Attack
programme.desc: Plaintiff Brenda claims her neighbor's pit bull attacked her dog and bit her, causing $4,643 in damages. Defendant Christine denies liability, stating the dogs aren’t hers and Brenda’s gate was open.

programme.title: The People's Court
programme.sub-title: Dog Mating Disaster
programme.desc: Jamar and Dana sue Marlene and Myriah for $1,200 after a failed puppy deal. They claim Marlene reneged on giving them puppies as agreed. Marlene argues the pups were gifts and refuses to comply.

programme.title: The People's Court
programme.sub-title: You Stole My Dog: Now Give It Back
programme.desc: Angel Guzman sues Damaris Damian for $3,000, claiming she kidnapped his Shih Tzu, Maxie, after he spent $2,000 at the vet. Damaris says Angel gave her Maxie to protect him from his Pitbull.

programme.title: The People's Court
programme.sub-title: Cruise Sinks A Family
programme.desc: Tania is suing her child's father for not reimbursing her for a cruise his daughter from another woman came on.

programme.title: The People's Court
programme.sub-title: Car Crash Crisis
programme.desc: Kathy is suing truck driver Doug for vehicular damages after claiming he illegally passed her on the right.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: Mom, You Never Showed Up For Me / Unlock: You Drugged Me On Christmas
programme.desc: Today on Karamo, Diamond wants to salvage her relationship with mother Alfreda. Unfortunately, they didn’t start spending time together until Diamond was 18 years old. Then, Raven believes that her boyfriend, De’Andre, has been drugging her.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: Teens In Trouble
programme.desc: Ronesha is an aggrieved mother who claims that her daughter has been nothing but trouble since the pandemic.
